C++ API Reference

Further Reading

  • Developer Documentation
  • .rst

mlx.core.divide

mlx.core.divide#

mlx.core.divide(a: Union[scalar, array], b: Union[scalar, array], stream: Union[None, Stream, Device] = None) → array#

Element-wise division.

Divide two arrays with numpy-style broadcasting semantics. Either or both input arrays can also be scalars.

Parameters:

  • a (array) – Input array or scalar.

  • b (array) – Input array or scalar.

Returns:

The quotient a / b.

Return type:

array

previous

mlx.core.dequantize

next

mlx.core.equal
